Kanpur Plastipack Ltd specializes in these essential tools, crafting them from superior materials like polypropylene to ensure they meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency.

Our team is very serious about product safety and it is woven into our culture at KPL. We are delighted to announce for the first time in the world among the FIBC manufacturers, that we have achieved the A+ level of BRCGS Packaging Materials accreditation.

En la industria de la logística y el almacenamiento, la importancia de soluciones de embalaje confiables, resistentes y versátiles no puede subestimarse. En el centro de estas soluciones están los héroes anónimos: las bolsas FIBC (Contenedores Intermedios Flexibles para Granel), comúnmente conocidas como big bags o bolsas a granel.

Kanpur Plastipack Ltd se especializa en estas herramientas esenciales, fabricándolas con materiales superiores como el polipropileno para garantizar que cumplan con los más altos estándares de calidad y eficiencia.

Las bolsas de polipropileno son reconocidas por su extraordinaria resistencia y durabilidad, lo que las hace ideales para una amplia gama de aplicaciones, desde el almacenamiento de granos y productos químicos hasta el transporte de materiales de construcción. El secreto de su robustez radica en el propio material:

En Kanpur Plastipack Ltd, combinamos casi cincuenta años de experiencia con tecnología de vanguardia para ofrecer no solo bolsas FIBC y a granel, sino soluciones de embalaje integrales.

Nuestro compromiso con la calidad está presente en cada bolsa de polipropileno y PP tejido que producimos, asegurando que no sean solo contenedores, sino socios clave en sus operaciones logísticas. Cada bolsa es una promesa de perfección.
Nuestras bolsas FIBC están diseñadas para mejorar la seguridad, optimizar la eficiencia y aumentar la productividad, satisfaciendo las necesidades dinámicas de las empresas en todo el mundo.
Ya sea para transportar mercancías pesadas o almacenar productos, nuestros big bags manejan todo con una fiabilidad inigualable.

Alla Kanpur Plastipack, consideriamo la storia il nostro più grande maestro e le tappe fondamentali la nostra guida alla crescita. Iniziando con la produzione di sacchi FIBC nell'anno 2000, siamo diventati un fornitore leader di soluzioni di movimentazione di materiali sfusi personalizzate. Il nostro percorso, alimentato da un'innovazione continua, ci ha visto crescere da un team di meno di 50 a oltre 3.000 dipendenti dedicati. Traguardi come la certificazione alimentare BRCGS, la nostra quotazione alla Borsa Nazionale dell'India e oltre 50 anni di esperienza nell'imballaggio industriale sfuso ci permettono di comprendere appieno le vostre esigenze specifiche di imballaggio.
Considerata tra i leader della tecnologia innovativa in India, KPL ha sostituito i telai piatti con telai circolari nel 1984 e ha iniziato la produzione di FIBC all'inizio del 21° secolo.

Nell'industria della logistica e dello stoccaggio, l'importanza di soluzioni di imballaggio affidabili, resistenti e versatili non può essere sottovalutata. Al centro di queste soluzioni ci sono gli eroi non celebrati: i sacchi FIBC (Flexible Intermediate Bulk Containers), comunemente noti come big bags o bulk bags.

Kanpur Plastipack Ltd è specializzata in questi strumenti essenziali, realizzandoli con materiali di alta qualità come il polipropilene, garantendo che soddisfino i più alti standard di qualità ed efficienza.

I sacchi in polipropilene sono noti per la loro straordinaria resistenza e durata, il che li rende ideali per un'ampia gamma di applicazioni, dalla conservazione di cereali e prodotti chimici al trasporto di materiali da costruzione. Il segreto della loro robustezza risiede nel materiale stesso:

I big bags di qualità non servono solo a contenere materiali; sono progettati per offrire prestazioni, sicurezza e affidabilità in ogni fase della catena di fornitura. I sacchi sfusi di alta qualità garantiscono:
Presso Kanpur Plastipack Ltd, combiniamo quasi cinquant'anni di esperienza con tecnologie all'avanguardia per offrire non solo sacchi FIBC e bulk bags, ma soluzioni di imballaggio complete.

Il nostro impegno per la qualità è incorporato in ogni sacco in polipropilene e PP intrecciato che produciamo, garantendo che non siano solo contenitori, ma partner fondamentali nelle tue operazioni logistiche. Ogni sacco è una promessa di perfezione.
I nostri sacchi FIBC sono progettati per migliorare la sicurezza, aumentare l'efficienza e ottimizzare la produttività, soddisfacendo le esigenze dinamiche delle aziende di tutto il mondo.
Sia che si tratti di trasportare merci pesanti o conservare prodotti, i nostri big bags gestiscono tutto con un'affidabilità senza pari.
Per soluzioni FIBC superiori che garantiscono qualità e soddisfazione del cliente, contattaci oggi stesso.

Paragraphs: What's New ?
At KPL, we understand your packaging needs and specialize in three specific types ofFIBC bagsuniversally labeled as TypeType A, B, or C.

If you are interested in these products, we welcome you to examine the elements involved in selecting an appropriate type of bag. It is important to assess the dangers involved in handling hazardous products. Our technical services team will be glad to assist you through this process.

Type A FIBC bags, or non-conductive bulk bags, prevent combustible dust explosions by using non-conductive materials that reduce static electricity buildup. Perfect for safely storing and transporting non-flammable materials, these bags meet stringent safety standards. They're widely used in industries like agriculture, construction, and chemicals. Discover the advantages and versatile applications of Type A FIBC bags for secure bulk material handling.
Cautions: Type A FIBC or Flexible Containers

Type B FIBC bags are designed to prevent the hazards of electrostatic charges during transportation. They use non-conductive materials to mitigate the risk of sparking, making them suitable for handling flammable materials safely.

In today's interconnected world, the safe transportation and storage of hazardous materials are paramount concerns for industries worldwide. Recognizing the critical importance of meeting stringent safety standards and regulatory compliance, Kanpur Plastipack proudly presents itscomprehensive range of UN Certified Packaging solutions, with a particular focus on UN FIBC Bags. At Kanpur Plastipack, we adhere unwaveringly to the United Nations Recommendations on the Transport of Dangerous Goods, ensuring that each product in our UN Certified Packaging lineup meets the highest standards of quality and compliance.

Among the array of UN Certified Packaging options, UN FIBC Bags stand out as versatile, robust solutions for industries grappling with hazardous substances. It has been an exceptionally joyful expedition till now. We thank each and every individual who contributed in his own small or big way towards contributing to the growth of the organization, making it into KPL as and were it stands today.
In times to come we expect not only same but more enhanced and increased level of support, co-operation & collaboration towards more fructuous and mutually beneficial years of association.
Post date:16-06-2021

The journey has been exhilarating till now, rewarding and enriching as it should have been. We have learnt and grown a lot in the past 5 decades,  hoping and aspiring to achieve more groundbreaking feats in times to come.
We are eternally grateful to all our past and current team members and of course our esteemed customers who have traversed so far with us, have made the experience a worthwhile one.
Last but not the least, continuous support of our suppliers and partners have withstood us through the decades and contributed to our growth.
We at KPL, believe in "Humans" as an asset far valuable than anything in the entire ecosystem of Industrial Domain .
We believe this school of thought sets the KPL family apart and shall act as the biggest catalyst in driving our future transformation'.

Title: Quality FIBC U Panel Bag Supplier - KPL
Meta Description: Quality virgin polymer FIBC u-panel bags with corner handles for added strength are proudly offered by KPL in diverse sizes, ideal for heavy lifting. Visit Now.

h2: What are the benefits of U panel bag?
Applications of U Panel bulk bags?
h3: Exploring U Panel Bags for Chemical and Cement Transportation

Paragraphs: What's New ?

U-Panel construction has two seams sewn along the two opposite sides to create two panels, creating a "U" Panel shape. Accepted as the industry standard around the world, the U-Panel FIBC is the most popular FIBC shape. This construction gives the bag a large lifting capacity.
The key benefits of U panel bag are:
They key applications of U panel bag are:
Introduction to U Panel Bags

U Panel bags, also known as U Panel Flexible Intermediate Bulk Containers (FIBCs), are a cornerstone in the bulk packaging industry. These bags, crafted from 100% virgin polypropylene polymer woven into a durable fabric, are designed for strength and efficiency. The unique U Panel construction involves cutting one long piece of material into a U shape and stitching it with two side panels. This design enhances the bag's strength and load-bearing capacity, making U Panel bags essential as cement bags for variousexclusive packaging solutions.
Key Benefits of U Panel Bags
U Panel bags have become widely popular due to their numerous advantages:
Thanks to their robust and adaptable nature, U Panel bags and our range ofexclusive retail productsare used across numerous industries:

Manufacturing U Panel bags involves a detailed process to ensure they meet industry standards. The bags are produced from 100% virgin polymer, woven into a sturdy polypropylene fabric. The U Panel design is achieved by cutting a single long piece of material into a U shape and stitching it with two side panels. This not only enhances structural integrity but also ensures uniform weight distribution.

Safety is a critical aspect of U Panel bag design, especially when used as cement bags. They come with a Safety Factor (SF) of 5:1 or 6:1, indicating that the bag can hold five to six times its Safe Working Load (SWL). This high safety margin ensures that the bags can handle extreme conditions without compromising the safety of the contents or handlers, making them particularly reliable as chemical bags.

U Panel bags represent the pinnacle of bulk packaging solutions, particularly for the transportation of heavy and sensitive materials like chemicals and cement. Their robust construction, combined with features such as moisture resistance, chemical resistance, and superior load-bearing capacity, make them an industry standard worldwide. As industries evolve, the demand for reliable and versatile packaging solutions like U Panel bags will continue to grow, solidifying their role in logistics and transportation.

For construction materials, chemicals, or agricultural products, U Panel bags offer a reliable, efficient, and safe solution for bulk transportation needs. Whether used as chemical bags or cement bags, U Panel bags highlight their essential role in modern industrial operations, providing unmatched durability and versatility.

h2: להוכיח את עצמנו באופן מתמשך כמצטיינים בסטנדרטים מחמירים

Paragraphs: What's New ?
הצוות שלנו מתייחס ברצינות רבה לבטיחות המוצרים, וזה חלק בלתי נפרד מהתרבות שלנו ב-KPL. אנו שמחים להכריז, לראשונה בעולם בין יצרני ה-FIBC, שהשגנו את רמת ההסמכה A+ של BRCGS עבור חומרי אריזה.

BRC מספק את אמת המידה בתעשייה, והסטנדרט הבסיסי שלו הופך במהירות לדרישה מינימלית ללקוחות מרכזיים. אנו מחויבים לשמירה על סטנדרטים גבוהים על ידי התמקדות מתמשכת בפיתוח עובדים, הכשרות ובניית תרבות בטיחות מוצרים בכל מה שאנחנו עושים.

להיות חברת ה-FIBC הראשונה שמוסמכת ל-BRCGS A+ משקף את המחויבות שלנו לייצור בסטנדרטים איכותיים שאנו מקפידים עליהם, וכל זאת במטרה "להשביע רצון" את דרישות הלקוחות שלנו. אנו מאמינים בקשרים ארוכי טווח, וזה תמיד דורש את סלילת הדרך לאמון ואת היכולת לעמוד בו תמיד. התעודה משקפת את הסטנדרטים שלנו ויותר מחמישה עשורים של ניסיון מוכיחים זאת שוב ושוב!
